resident evil blows ass, this games far better

You know i was looking at the the psx games on TPB and seen this and just had to write somthing, i remember when these games first came out i played the shit out of them, as well as my mom, this and redident evil. But this game is the shit, it is worth a play if you have never tryed it out before. 8/10 in my books man. I think i'll download it.
